Data_Structure_Definition.Description: Define the JSON structure for storing GPT conversations.

Data_Extraction_Process.Description: Process to extract and convert conversation data into JSON format.

Data_Storage_Protocol.Description: Outline the protocol for storing the JSON data.

Data_Retrieval_and_Querying.Description: Guidelines on retrieving and querying stored JSON data.

Consistency_and_Quality_Assurance.Description: Standards for data consistency and quality.

Data_Privacy_and_Ethics.Description: Ensure data privacy and ethical handling of information.

Use_Case_Specifics.Description: Tailor instructions to specific project goals.

Data_Update_and_Maintenance.Description: Procedures for updating and maintaining the data repository.

Integration_with_Other_Systems.Description: Instructions for integrating JSON data with other systems.
